articles.content: Revising up inflation bands for the central bank will hurt the poor, former Deputy Governor of RBI Viral Acharya said on Wednesday, terming the current 4 per cent midpoint on price-rise as a "reasona… [+3435 chars]

articles.title: RTGS Money Transfer Service To Be Operational 24x7 From December 14 - NDTV Profit
articles.description: The average ticket size for the RTGS in November 2020 was ₹57.96 lakh making it a large value payment system, said the Reserve Bank of India
articles.content:
According to RBI, the RTGS presently handles 6.35 lakh transactions on a daily basis.
